title: Buy Pure Storage Stock Because It Can Continue to Gain Market Share, Analyst Says
text:
Pure Storage (PSTG) stock is trading higher Thursday after Goldman Sachs analyst Rod Hall lifted his rating on the producer of flash-memory based storage systems to Buy from Neutral, with a new price target of $21, up from $18.

Hall says the company will continue to gain storage market share in particular with mid-sized companies, “even as large enterprise spending weakness disproportionately hurts larger storage vendors.” In other words, he finds an advantage for Pure in its relatively modest exposure to large companies....
description: Pure Storage stock is climbing after Goldman Sachs upgraded the stock and boosted its price target.
